ArtistModal.title: Are you a music lover? We have an offer for you!
ArtistModal.description: Tell us about your favorite artist by filling out a simple form and sending it to us. Later, our team will contact the artist and invite him to submit his track to MusicDex platform!
ArtistModal.form_title: Please, fill out the artist's data
ArtistModal.form_description: If you have any questions or need assistance, feel free to reach out to our team at
ArtistModal.telegram_description: Join our Telegram channel for the latest updates on news and music trends straight to your fingertips!

Auth.wrong_password: Email address and password do not match.
Auth.email_is_not_verified: Please check your mailbox and verify your email.
Auth.signup_artist_title: Create an account as an artist
Auth.link_to_artist_signup: Sign up as an artist, producer or composer
Auth.agreement_text: By clicking on “Sign Up” or signing-up with Google or Twitter you expressly agree to our Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.
Auth.enter_email: Enter your email address and we’ll send you the link to reset your password
Auth.reset_password_content: A letter with instructions for resetting the password has been sent to your email.
Auth.verify_message1: If you previously registered with this email address, please check your inbox for a verification to confirm your identity.
Auth.verify_message2: If this was not you, for security, please set a new password through the email. Click the button below to send this email.
Auth.email_sent_signup: We have sent an email to your registered email address with instructions on how to verify your account. Please check your inbox and follow the link provided to complete the verification process.
Auth.email_sent_reset: An email with instructions to reset your password has been sent to your registered email address. Please check your inbox and follow the link provided in the email to complete the password reset process. If you don't see the email in your inbox, please check your spam or junk folder.
